original_title: Symphonica Toscanini/Lorin Maazel: Verdi - Messa da Requiem
overview: Norma Fantini, Anna Smirnova, Francesco Meli, and Rafal Siwek are featured with Lorin Maazel conducting the Symphonica Toscanini and Coro del Maggio Musicale Fiorentino in this 2007 performance at the basilica of St. Mark's in Venice.
title: Symphonica Toscanini/Lorin Maazel: Verdi - Messa da Requiem
